core:description.text: A distinctive hammered copper cup, its surface cold to the touch and beaded with condensation. Inside, a fizzing mixture of spirits and ginger beer churns with ice, crowned by a generous wedge of lime. The spicy-sweet aroma of ginger dominates.

containers-core:liquid_container.flavorText: Ice-cold and intensely refreshing, the cocktail delivers an immediate ginger kick that warms the throat even as the icy drink cools. Lime adds a citrus brightness, while the vodka provides a clean backdrop that lets the spice shine.
